Title: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference
Description: Arbitrary file upload and XML External Entity processing.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 2.3.0 before 2.3.7, all versions starting from 3.0.0 before 3.0.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 2.3.0, all versions starting from 2.3.7 before 3.0.0, all versions starting from 3.0.1
